Alberto makes a real "gourmet" pizza - the best in the city! The crust is tender and crisp, the toppings are always fresh and he offers a very interesting, imaginative menu of toppings from which to choose.
His pizzas are truly addictive! Try one, you'll like it!
Correction: You'll LOVE it!
